completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith with 1 part (Desktop - Tauri v2 + React 19 + Rust). App root: upwork-researcher/
Found 100+ existing docs: 6 outdated in docs/, 2 current signing guides, 11 planning artifacts, 80+ implementation artifacts, 2 CI pipelines
Tech stack: Tauri v2.9.1 + React 19 + Rust 2021 + SQLCipher + 80+ IPC commands. Architecture: Tauri IPC Bridge.
Conditional analysis: 32 state mgmt patterns (3 Zustand, 16 hooks, 12 React Query, 1 Context), 75+ UI components, 15 DB tables (30 migrations), CI/CD with code signing
Source tree documented: ~217 source files, ~127 test files across frontend (React), backend (Rust), migrations, and CI/CD
Development guide written: prerequisites, setup, commands, testing strategy, code quality, env vars, release process
Skipped - monolith project, no multi-part integration
Architecture doc written: executive summary, tech stack, core components, security layer, CI/CD, design decisions
Supporting docs: project-overview.md, component-inventory.md (75+ components), data-models.md (15 tables)
Master index generated with links to 8 generated docs + existing planning/implementation/app docs

conditional_analysis.state_management: 32 patterns: 3 Zustand stores, 16 custom hooks, 12 React Query hooks, 1 Context
conditional_analysis.ui_components: 75+ components: 58 in components/, 17 in features/, 6 UI primitives
conditional_analysis.data_models: 15 tables, 30 migrations (V1-V30), SQLCipher AES-256, WAL mode
conditional_analysis.deployment: 3 GitHub Actions workflows, macOS notarization + Windows Authenticode, semantic versioning

resume_instructions: Workflow complete. Re-run for incremental updates.
